item.title: Monitoring Apache Cloudstack with Prometheus and Grafana
item.description: Monitoring Cloudstack with Prometheus and Grafana Cloudstack supports prometheus integration and it exports various metrics for the prometheus server to Scrape Enable prometheus integragration on Cloudstack Management server Enable prometheus plugin in Cloudstack Management server Login to the database or enable the following global setting parameters prometheus.exporter.enable : Enable the prometheus exporter plugin, management server restart needed. prometheus.exporter.allowed.ips: List of comma separated prometheus server ips (with no spaces) that should be allowed to access the metrics endpoint.
